metadata.title: CVE-2024-27034 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Compliant (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved:f2fs: compress: fix to cover normal cluster write with cp_rwsemWhen we overwrite compressed cluster w/ normal cluster, we shouldnot unlock cp_rwsem during f2fs_write_raw_pages(), otherwise datawill be corrupted if partial blocks were persisted before CP & SPOR,due to cluster metadata wasn't updated atomically.

criterions.comment: linux-fips package in fips-updates/bionic is affected and may need fixing.
